Serialized Form

Package org.macquarie.philosophy.animated

Class org.macquarie.philosophy.animated.Animator extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

mState

Animatable mState
Aggregated object which maintains the state of this animation from one frame to the next.

mRunning

boolean mRunning
The animation thread will keep running for as long as this variable is set to true. Setting it to false will cause the animation loop to stop, the run() method to exit and the animation thread to die.

mAnimatorThread

java.lang.Thread mAnimatorThread
The thread in which this animator is running.

The main application window.

MainPanel mMainPanel
The main panel containing the animator and its control buttons.

Class org.macquarie.philosophy.animated.MainPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

mButton

javax.swing.JButton mButton
A button to press to restart the animation.

mAnimation

PhilosopherAnimation mAnimation
An object used to keep track of the current state of the animation and to step if from one frame to the next.

mAnimator

Animator mAnimator
An animator object which is used to regularly update the state of the animation.

Class org.macquarie.ticker.TickerExample extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

jContentPane

javax.swing.JPanel jContentPane
A convenience variable, which we use to hold a reference to the applications content pane object.

mStockTicker

StockTicker mStockTicker
Our GUI contains only a single component, a StockTicker widget which is referred to by the following variable.

MarketFeed mFeed
We also need a variable to hold the MarketFeed object we'll use to provide our stock ticker with stock price quotes.
